articles.content: Today's popular Google Doodle game is a throwback to Halloween 2016. The Google Doodle has been redesigned for the Stay and Play at Home series, so today the first O in Google is dressed as a cat uses a magic wand to make the second O, which is dressed as a g… [+2317 chars]

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Twitter tests a cleaner interface for threaded conversations - The Verge
articles.description: Twitter is showing some iOS and web users a new interface to make it easier to follow threaded conversations. The new interface uses lines and indents to make it much easier to see who’s responding to who in a Twitter thread.
articles.content:
Originally launched in its prototype app twttr
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Twitter is showing some iOS and web users a new interface to make it easier to follow threaded conversations, the company has announced. A gif published by Twitters Suppo… [+1587 chars]

articles.author: Kevin Knezevic
articles.title: Animal Crossing's Fake Art Does Some Creepy Things - GameSpot
articles.description: Redd is back selling forged artwork in New Horizons, and it looks like some of the pieces might be just a little haunted.
articles.content: Animal Crossing: New Horizons' latest update brought back two returning characters: the shrub-selling Leif and shady art vendor Redd. The latter operates a small merchant ship called Jolly Redd's Treasure Trawler, which is the only place you can purchase artw… [+1689 chars]
